mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM(SELECT r.no,img,content,rate,r.regdate,rcps_open_no rcpsOpenNo, o.no, member_no memberNo, recipe_no recipeNo, o.regdate FROM rcp_rvs r, rcps_open o WHERE rcps_open_no = o.no) WHERE recipeNo = #{no}

SELECT rvs.no no, rvs.img img, rvs.content content, rvs.rate rate, rvs.regdate regdate, open.member_no reviewerNo, open.recipe_no rcpNo, rcps.title rcpTitle, rcps.img rcpImg, rcps.content rcpContent, m.nickname reviewerNickname, m.profile_img reviewerProfileImg FROM rcp_rvs rvs, rcps_open open, rcps, members m WHERE open.recipe_no = #{rcpNo} AND rcps.no = #{rcpNo} AND open.no = rvs.rcps_open_no AND m.no = open.member_no

SELECT rvs.rate rate, rvs.content content, rvs.regdate regdate, rvs.img img, rcps.img rcpImg, rcps.title rcpTitle, rcps.no rcpNo, m.nickname writerNickname, m.profile_img writerProfileImg, m.no writerNo FROM rcp_rvs rvs, rcps, rcps_open open, members m WHERE rvs.rcps_open_no = open.no AND open.member_no = #{memberNo} AND open.recipe_no = rcps.no AND rcps.member_no = m.no

mapper.select: SELECT rvs.rate, rvs.content, r.no rcpNo FROM rcps r, rcps_open open, rcp_rvs rvs WHERE r.no = open.recipe_no AND rvs.rcps_open_no = open.no AND r.no = (SELECT r.no FROM rcps_open open, rcps r WHERE open.recipe_no = r.no AND open.no = #{rcpsOpenNo})
